notes.text:
Red Hat 3scale API Management 2.11.1 Release - Container Images

A security update for Red Hat 3scale API Management is now available from the Red Hat Container Catalog.

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Moderate. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability listed as CVE link(s) in the References section.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
Red Hat 3scale API Management delivers centralized API management features through a distributed, cloud-hosted layer. It includes built-in features to help in building a more successful API program, including access control, rate limits, payment gateway integration, and developer experience tools.

This advisory is intended to use with Container Images, for Red Hat 3scale API Management 2.11.1.

Security Fix(es):

* rubygem-nokogiri: XML external entity injection via Nokogiri::XML::Schema (CVE-2020-26247)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
notes.title: Details

cwe.name: Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference

notes.text: A flaw was found in Nokogiri. XML Schemas parsed by Nokogiri::XML::Schema are trusted by default, allowing external resources to be accessed over the network, potentially enabling XML External Entity (XXE) or Server-side request forgery (SSRF) attacks. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: rubygem-nokogiri: XML external entity injection via Nokogiri::XML::Schema
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

remediations.details:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata relevant to your system have been applied.

For details on how to apply this update, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_3scale_api_management/2.11/html-single/installing_3scale/index
There are no known workarounds for affected versions. Please refer to the upstream advisory page for additional information.

vulnerabilities.title: rubygem-nokogiri: XML external entity injection via Nokogiri::XML::Schema
